products.title: HP Photosmart Premium C310a
products.description:
The HP Photosmart Premium C310a is an All-in-One, budget-friendly printer designed for printing, copying, scanning, and web connectivity. It’s a bit more expensive than the HP Photosmart Plus B210a, but it still remains budget-friendly. In particular, the only difference is higher speeds, the incorporation of automatic duplexing, and a much larger touchscreen display. Like its counterpart, the device can be accessed by any network computer via integrated 802.11b/g/n connectivity. Plus if it’s installed in an office infrastructure defined by the Blackberry Enterprise Server, it can be accessed by any Internet- and email-capable BlackBerry smartphone OS 4.5.

Features

  • Print, Copy, Scan, Fax, Web
  • Up to 33 / 32ppm Black/Color Print
  • Up to 600x600 / 9600x2400 Color Resolution
  • Up to 1200dpi Scanner Resolution (24-Bit)
  • Up to 30 / 32cpm Copy Speed
  • 4.3" Color Graphic Touchscreen Display
  • Automatic Duplex
  • Borderless Printing up to 8.5x11"
  • Direct Photo Printing (Memory Cards, PictBridge)
  • 125-Sheet Input Tray
  • 20-Sheet Photo Tray
  • USB/WiFi Connectivity
  • Memory Card Support
  • ePrint Functionality
  • Integrated Templates

pros.text: photo printing - produces colorful and detailed pictures
B&W print quality - operates quickly and produces good results on multipurpose paper
great for mobile devices - features easy wireless and Internet printing
quiet - doesn't make too much noise
multi-funcition: print, copy, scan and fax
ePrint functionality - allows you to print from any device, from anywhere, just by sending your print job to the device's dedicated e-mail address

cons.text: touchscreen build quality - tends to develop a colored tint and various other display issues
lacks Ethernet connectivity - doesn't supported wired network printing
setup - some users will have difficulty getting network printing to work properly
might not work correctly when plugged into a surge protector
no automatic document feeder - you must scan / copy each individual page manually
touchscreen interface is slow and unresponsive
apps system is flawed - too slow and annoying to use when you probably have a much faster, easier to use computer nearby
no manual button controls - forced to use the touchscreen for everything
